snippet.title: Splatter: Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD THE NEXT FEST DEMO FOR FREE HERE: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1768920/

We're back with a new trailer and a new demo!

Splatter is an ultracolorful, hyperviolent fever dream where you blast constantly-adapting enemies into neon sprays of pulp and slime. 

Enter a digital mindscape constructed by four anonymous administrators. This world is one built for violence - a series of surreal yet strangely familiar levels full of brightly-colored enemies and tools with which to kill them. Blast enemies with your finger guns, chug cans of energy drinks, and maintain your brain chemistry. 
To win, you must overcome each challenge and outsmart hordes of enemies that learn as you defeat them. Your victories, however, may come at a terrible price. Decipher the messages sent to you by the administrators of this strange world, and try to uncover their motives before it is too late. 
Can you survive? Can you remain sane? Can you remain yourself?

Follow The Rat King Collective on Twitter for updates and development info:
https://twitter.com/rattusrattusart

Join our Discord:
https://discord.gg/KVxpFsJtcH
